title: Google Calendar Integration
description: Set up Google Calendar access via OAuth or CalDAV to read and create calendar events. Need to complete app password setup or OAuth flow.

title: Gmail Inbox Triage & Priority Email Digest
description: Set up Gmail API access (OAuth) to read inbox, categorize emails by priority, identify important emails needing response, and send daily priority email digest at 6:15 AM IST (separate from AI news email).

title: Interactive Two-Way Voice Calling
description: Build webhook server and real-time conversation handling for interactive phone calls. Enable Andy to have back-and-forth conversations, listen to responses, and adapt conversation flow dynamically.

title: Voice Calling Integration with Twilio
description: Set up Twilio API integration to enable Andy to make phone calls on user's behalf. Includes text-to-speech for speaking, call recording, and transcription capabilities.

title: Dashboard - Task Comments & Subtasks
description: Add ability to add comments/notes to tasks and break tasks into smaller subtasks for better organization and collaboration.

title: Dashboard Improvements - Dependencies & Time Tracking
description: Add task dependency management and time tracking features to the dashboard. Allow tasks to depend on other tasks and track estimated vs actual time spent.

title: Flight Search - Chennai to Lisbon
description: Find cheapest flights from Chennai to Lisbon for February departure, March return

title: Andy Testing Group Setup
description: Register and configure Andy Testing WhatsApp group

title: Project Dashboard
description: Build secure project management dashboard with enhanced features

title: Build Automatic Backlog Monitoring
description: Create system where user requests automatically go to backlog, Andy monitors and works on them, moving tasks through stages automatically

description: Research and create document about best restaurants in Chennai
